OrganizationalUnitIds.Description: A comma seperated list of organizational unit ids, you may also provide the root id if you want all accounts

ReportBucketArn.Description: The ARN of the Bucket where Cost and Usage reports are being sent

ReportBucketRegion.Description: The Region your Report Bucket was created in

ReportPrefix.Description: The Prefix listed for the Cost and Usage Report

ReportName.Description: The Name of the Cost and Usage Report

KloudsUserIdentifier.Description: A temporary ID used to refer back to the user that requested this in app, do not change.

ConnectorPrincipalId.Description: The principal that is allowed to assume this role, do not change.

ConnectorExternalId.Description: The external id used to match the connector when assuming this role, do not change.

ConnectorEndpoint.Description: The endpoint to send the role arn to when complete so kloud.io can assume this role, do not change.

Properties.Description: Deploys read-only IAM Roles in each account in order to connect to klouds.io

Description: Generates Stack Sets across all your accounts to connect to klouds.io
